name: Groove Coaster
summary:
A Groove Game in Roller Coaster Form!

From the mind of Reisuke Ishida, creator of the internationally award-winning SPACE INVADERS INFINITY GENE: an exhilarating next-gen groove game!

Touch to the rhythm! This game offers exhilarating groove-filled roller coaster action with simple one-finger controls!

The more you play, the more the game levels up! Persistance is rewarded, with new characters and other elements unlocked through play!

Create an original stage that grows and changes according to your progress through the game! Impress your friends!

The music included covers a wide spectrum, from rock and pop to hip-hop and techno!

Don't just listen to music, game with it!
